title: dbc23
author: dbc23
content: It is either your world is rotating or you are making it rotate. There is no in-between. I believe so much in success no matter how long it takes me to achieve one. The difference between who I am now and what I aspire in the future should just be time. And while I wait for the timing my brains, hands, resource, energy and passion should be able to prepare me for that very time.The world is cruel but yet the creative excel. I don't gamble my time for anything else it mostly based on preference, priority and level of importance. I shared my time evenly with what ever I have to do. It is either I am productive or I am contributive.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Everybody wants to succeed, meet anybody on the road and ask his\her plans in life, you will see lots and lots of beautiful ideas, sometimes a lot of them put in the effort but yet, their effort don't really yield tangible result. Pushing too hard sometimes don't mean your going to get excellent result, sometimes you might not even get any result at all. Being productive is a go idea, your hunger for success too is a good idea, but as humans always create room to absorb little disappointment, patient they say is a virtue, the reason why there is "Time" in human nature, is so that everything will not happen at once, the human life is a marathon race not sprint.    Life is a journey.

comments.author: MaxMueller
comments.body: Nobody wants to be the richest on a lonely table or the fittest on the graveyard.Life is about Love, Health and pleasure. Do what you love and success will come all by itself. Pushing always for the next succes will make you fail what life is about.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: Turbartuluk on August 22, 2023, 01:07:40 PMNobody wants to be the richest on a lonely table or the fittest on the graveyard.Life is about Love, Health and pleasure. Do what you love and success will come all by itself. Pushing always for the next succes will make you fail what life is about. Perfect response.Happiness isn’t about how much money you have. Health is wealth, being happy is about a lot more than how many Benjamin’s you have to your name. A close & reliable group of friends & family & a job you enjoy is all you need to be happy.

comments.author: MaxMueller
comments.body: Maybe some other food for thought:1. If you earn about $3.000 a month as an employee and the risk-free retur is 3% than your human capital is about  $1.200.000 -> just take care of that capital2. If evolution decided to make mankind rest and sleep 1/3 of their lifetime you would be a fool to fight against recovery: keyword Supercompensation.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Turbartuluk on August 23, 2023, 10:45:12 AM1. If you earn about $3.000 a month as an employee and the risk-free retur is 3% than your human capital is about  $1.200.000 -> just take care of that capitalProper management of what you have already especially finance is the way to get more. Someone who earns less than someone who earns more but has the good habit of managing it more will do better than an individual who earns more money but mismanages it. Taking care of what you earn means proper financial intelligence.

comments.author: sesterceshop
comments.body: Personal growth involves both success and happiness. It's about using our time wisely while also prioritizing well-being. Success isn't just what we achieve outwardly; it's also about inner contentment.Money can help, but it's not everything. We must manage time, energy, emotions, and relationships – they're all vital. The aim? A happy, fulfilling life through balance in every aspect.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Working hard to achieve things is important because it allows us to grow, learn & reach our full potential. It teaches us discipline, resilience & the value of perseverance. When we put in the effort we not only improve our skills and abilities but we also gain a sense of fulfilment & satisfaction. Hard work lays the foundation for success and enables us to overcome obstacles & challenges along the way. It demonstrates our dedication & commitment, ultimately opening doors to new opportunities & bringing us closer to our goals. The journey of hard work often leads to the sweetest victories, good things do not often come easy.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: dbc23 on February 20, 2023, 08:30:33 PMThe difference between who I am now and what I aspire in the future should just be time. And while I wait for the timing my brains, hands, resource, energy and passion should be able to prepare me for that very time.The world is cruel but yet the creative excel. I don't gamble my time for anything else it mostly based on preference, priority and level of importance. I shared my time evenly with what ever I have to do. It is either I am productive or I am contributive. yet you keep mentioning time and waitingdont wait for things. dont think of things in a "time" concept. instead just do things, even small things that all have some sort of direction towards your goalsif you aspire to become something then motivate yourself that each action NOW is a progression to that point.even when with family at the weekend. dont think of it as spending time. think of it as investing time in recreation and recharging your social battery to give you the mental and physical energy to progress with your goals weekdayseven sleeping is not wasting time. its recharging, even taking a day off sick is not wasting time. its recuperating to be stronger to work better latertreat every action as a positive direction to goal and you will become more disciplined in your mind on your goalwhen you start to treat each action as a positive that is drawing you closer to your goals. you will start to be more motivated to concentrate on them without effort

comments.author: Cyber_Alien
comments.body: Life isn't simple, anyway.Everyone experiences bad times in life, but you just have to get over them and seize the opportunities to enjoy the good times.

comments.author: TakeItEasy
comments.body: Quote from: dbc23 on February 20, 2023, 08:30:33 PMIt is either your world is rotating or you are making it rotate. There is no in-between. I believe so much in success no matter how long it takes me to achieve one. The difference between who I am now and what I aspire in the future should just be time. I don't gamble my time for anything else it mostly based on preference, priority and level of importance. I shared my time evenly with what ever I have to do. It is either I am productive or I am contributive. Nobody is here who wants himself that he is down, everyone is working for success in the world where we see every person struggle day and night for their dreams. While we have seen some people we have seen that they only struggle to survive and they got a time meal and they didn't have money for the second time meals, so they are just struggling down again and again daily. And also we have seen some people who have more money and still, they are trying to even make it more and more. Do you know how the world is different? If someone doesn't have money he is trying to get the money but if someone has money he is also trying for it. This is just out of mind.The main thing is everyone is trying to live a happy life, and everyone wants his life fully surrounded by comfortable things. So, it is very difficult for everyone but it is a race of life and luck and everyone is trying their best some put 100% into it to get to the top position and are going to wait for a good time.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: Of course you are right OP. It is either you are born rich or born poor. The choice is always yours to decide how you want to continue and or if you want to make changes.The chances of being poor could require matter of seconds but the chances here of being rich could take up  or over long and longer periods of time.Aspirations to  prosperities could come through considering>>>* Timing adherence: Efficient and proactive time management would prioritize your schedules of tasks execution and enhances you increases to variety performances to do more and great * Your surroundings: Successful is depended on the quality and potentials of those you are entangled and surrounded along because company serves an influence to to produce its likely results. So if must succeed on your endivoirs, then must walk, work and network with those in the same journey as you for diversification of ideas and your environment is also a considerations pertaining your mode to stay focused and strategies.* Creativity: An essence of creativity is essential to successful productiveness and also considering the values of your ideals to be profitable to oneself and to the society with a prior to make unique or ideological impactation. Your ability to creativities insights new opportunities and also paves the way to identify problems with the skills to profer solutions.* Reality exhibitions: As said that knowledge being practically expressed to reality is a convincible and optimistic believable quest. Of course this exercise is termed to attribute to the awareness promotions by public attractions of services.* Resource capital: To succeed on successful quest,  it is an invest that is required resources to capitalize an investment. This may require time dedication resources, monetary resources, technical or physical being resources to fit in make the change as to exchange to twistedness of building riches. This serves as potential energy to explorations and create chances to secure future valuabilty.*Adaptation: Adaptation of making changes such as advancement to ideas and change of environment if necessary shouldn't be a big task as investors or an entrepreneur skills in corporation to considering public service is flexibilities and must dance to the tunes of changes else the stimulated energy becomes invalid unrealistic.* Continuity: Keep trying and keep going is a keyword with the potentials to succeed or it is a gear up for advancement where you don't have to o settle for less. Your endivoirs of continuities could ensure an sufficient quality and quantity and the patient Must be at the readiness to emerge mission critical operations while proceeds during disrupts or in the event of disasters.Too many criteria to being rich with possibility of tough times involved but just a onekey to poorness with no tike demanded.This is why you have to be timely response of schedules and your endivoirs if being rich is the only option.

comments.author: Sanugarid
comments.body: Everyone probably wants to be successful in life, that's why we work hard to achieve our dreams in life.Life is not easy, it is cruel but we keep fighting because we have no choice. Because if we don't act, what will happen to us? We are the only ones who will suffer if we don't fight or work hard. That's where our creativity comes in to survive in a very cruel world.

comments.author: TakeItEasy
comments.body: Quote from: Sanugarid on November 03, 2023, 03:05:27 PMEveryone probably wants to be successful in life, that's why we work hard to achieve our dreams in life.Life is not easy, it is cruel but we keep fighting because we have no choice. Because if we don't act, what will happen to us? We are the only ones who will suffer if we don't fight or work hard. That's where our creativity comes in to survive in a very cruel world.Thinking About success is easy but working for the success is too difficult, as there are many hurdles comes in a way of a person, and the hurdles is no especially related to the crypto trading or any other online work. We have seen some people who work very hard till the ends but they faces some problems and some pressures whether it is from their family side and from their offices etc. and from their relatives. But they tend to work hard again and again.I mean mostly fortune works, as I have seen most of the people who work hard according to their will power and they way of life but they failed to achieve their target as their fortune didn't give them any hope, and due to their bad fortune they loss everything and even they lost hope in the last stage of their work and thus they quit very sadly.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: dbc23 on February 20, 2023, 08:30:33 PMIt is either your world is rotating or you are making it rotate. There is no in-between. I believe so much in success no matter how long it takes me to achieve one. The difference between who I am now and what I aspire in the future should just be time. And while I wait for the timing my brains, hands, resource, energy and passion should be able to prepare me for that very time.The world is cruel but yet the creative excel. I don't gamble my time for anything else it mostly based on preference, priority and level of importance. I shared my time evenly with what ever I have to do. It is either I am productive or I am contributive. Sadly, loads of people are yet to understand that everyone on the surface of the earth is spending his own currency of TIME, people don't even know that, who you choose to spend your time with is relevant both to your pursuit and to your life entirely.There are loads of things you have to achieve and the version of humanity you have to become is dependent on time, therefore, so much depends on how you decide to spend your time and with whom and where.Going to school requires time, buiding requires time, training an offspring requires time, more than other resources time is the priceless of them all and its not going to be valuable if you don't place value on it. Every other thing is replacable except for time spent. Don't joke with your time.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Success sometime comes gradual is not something that always take place at a time it is important for people not to lose hope , if it doesn't work today it can work tomorrow.  Success will definitely come so far as what you are doing you are doing it the right way , so just believe.  Those who have patience to wait for it at right time don't regret for their time waiting.  But if you are not patience you can end do sometimes to get success by all means which can end to regret.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Quote from: dbc23 on February 20, 2023, 08:30:33 PMIt is either your world is rotating or you are making it rotate. There is no in-between. I believe so much in success no matter how long it takes me to achieve one. The difference between who I am now and what I aspire in the future should just be time. And while I wait for the timing my brains, hands, resource, energy and passion should be able to prepare me for that very time.The world is cruel but yet the creative excel. I don't gamble my time for anything else it mostly based on preference, priority and level of importance. I shared my time evenly with what ever I have to do. It is either I am productive or I am contributive. The world is really a better place for everyone if properly planned, no one waits for manner to fall from above as anyone who does such will wait till eternity because it will never come. Most times, I have come to realize that the reasons why people fail is as a result of fear and not being too open to creativity of new ideas like they're quite afraid of failing. Inasmuch as life is concerned, failure is part of success as sometimes failure unleash some potentials in a person because when you fail it will enable you to restrategize and come out with more concise solution about a problem. Another thing in life is confidence like you need to believe in yourself in whatever thing you're doing rather than having a doubtful thought. The world is open to greater achievement if you open your mind to positivity and possibility.

This the highest that gives joy and sound health on human kind.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: dbc23 on February 20, 2023, 08:30:33 PMIt is either your world is rotating or you are making it rotate. There is no in-between. I believe so much in success no matter how long it takes me to achieve one. The difference between who I am now and what I aspire in the future should just be time. And while I wait for the timing my brains, hands, resource, energy and passion should be able to prepare me for that very time.The world is cruel but yet the creative excel. I don't gamble my time for anything else it mostly based on preference, priority and level of importance. I shared my time evenly with what ever I have to do. It is either I am productive or I am contributive. Waiting for a convenient time to make that move that'll change your life for the better can mean relaxing on your comfort zone, and in that cozy place, the opportunity might not crawl into your lap, so in essence if you want to get something done, that means that you have to leave the comfort zone and work towards it. It's said that nothing good comes easy and there's no food for a lazy man, so we don't need to wait for opportunities of a better life to come to us, we have to make the move and reach out to opportunities, because there's a chance that you're not the only one that needs the opportunities. Poverty is a plague, so avoid it by being proactive and productive.
